org.sd.text
Class AbstractWordGramSplitter

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.AbstractWordGramSplitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordGramSplitter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CapitalizedPhraseSplitter, DefaultWordGramSplitter
public abstract class AbstractWordGramSplitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements WordGramSplitter

Abstract implementation of the WordGramSplitter interface.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Construct with the given normalizer and wordAcceptor.

NOTE: The normalizer and/or wordAcceptor can be null.

setWordAcceptor

setConcatDelim

public void setConcatDelim(char concatDelim)
Set the concatDelim.

Note that if never set, the concatDelim defaults to a single space. To set the concatDelim as "nothing", use (char)0. This would be useful for asian character strings, for example.

getNormalizer

public Normalizer getNormalizer()
Get this instance's normalizer.

splitIntoTokens

protected java.lang.String[] splitIntoTokens(Normalizer normalizer,
                                             java.lang.String string)
Use the instance's non-null normalizer to split the string.

By default, this does NOT split on camel case.

getWordGrams

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWordGrams(java.lang.String string)
Get the word grams from the given string.

Specified by:
getWordGrams in interface WordGramSplitter

findWordGram

public int[] findWordGram(java.lang.String wordGram,
                          java.lang.String text)
Find the (first instance of the) wordGram in the text.

Note that if this splitter uses normalizations to compute wordGrams, then the same normalizations will need to be applied to the text in order to find the wordGram within.

Specified by:
findWordGram in interface WordGramSplitter
Returns:
the wordGram's start and end positions in the text or null if not present.

concat

protected java.lang.String concat(WordGramSplitter.Word[] words,

Concatenate word tokens starting at fromPos (inclusive) until toPos (exclusive).

concatN

protected java.lang.String concatN(WordGramSplitter.Word[] words,
                                   int fromPos,
                                   int n)
Concatenate N (non-ignored) word tokens starting at fromPos (inclusive).

concatDelim

protected void concatDelim(java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
Concatenate a word separating delimiter onto the end of the builder.

This implementation adds a single space char.
